title: Oceanic Artathon - Sponsored by Wacom and SMASH!

replies.body:
Hey guys! I wanted to give a little extra context about this contest, because it's something new that we're trying out and some of you might be wondering - why not just run three separate contests?

One of the things we'd love to see in OCE is more opportunities for passionate players to turn their talents into something sustainable. Our partnership with Wacom has given us a chance to share tools to help you elevate your craft, but we wanted to create something that had a 'big bang' impact. By combining three competitions into one mega marathon, we're able to offer larger, more substantial prizes – such as an Artists' Alley booth or a Cintiq – which provide a huge opportunity for artists to potentially turn their hobby into something more.

As I mentioned - this is something new we're trying, so please let me know if you love it, hate it, etc.!
Great idea guys. It's a really cool concept and there are some great submissions!

Damn, my submission is ultra weird looking. I ignored the contest for a while, then decided I wanted to have a shot five days before the final date... But I think that’s the great part about this contest. Even if you did garbage (or at least you think you did) this round, there’s always two others to make up for it. And contests in general are a great way to practice :) Thank you again for all these wonderful competitions.
im so keen for this, a shot at having a table at smash2018 is amazing and a cintiq!. My entry is almost done for the first prompt {{champion:16}} {{champion:103}} <:

Hello, just letting you guys know at Riot that I've had to re-submit twice (the most recent one from me is the correct one) as I've realized I accidentally submitted the wrong one. They look similar but the more recent one is more updated. I hope this is okay! Thank you for the awesome art competitions they keep me inspired. <3
Gotcha - all good! :)
This happened to me too! I hope everything is ok. Thank you for such an awesome event! My first one actually :)
Hi! I submitted my artwork but somehow it got rotated so it's landscape instead of portrait. :/ is there a way to update the entry with the correct orientation?
Hey Essen! I've just fixed it on our side so should display correctly in portrait orientation for voting etc. :D

> [{quoted}](name=Achenar,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=ZbyHiK2V,comment-id=00170000,timestamp=2018-05-06T09:52:08.160+0000)
>
> Hey Essen! I've just fixed it on our side so should display correctly in portrait orientation for voting etc. :D

Thank you so much!

Hey~ 
Just wondering if my entry went through okay since my net is kinda dodgy right now ^^;;
I've just checked and it's there, you're all set. :)

I didn't really plan out this piece properly lol
anyway, I think I uploaded the same piece twice on accident ;=; hope that's okay!
i may be from a different region in the world but my acc is in oce can i still participate?

Hey Rynure1, from the master rules:

'1. Eligibility:You must be a legal resident of the Australia,  New Zealand, Fiji, New Caledonia, Papua New Guinea and Polynesia countries. '

So unfortunately you must be from the Oceanic region to be eligible!
aww that makes me really sad. i do some nice art work, and it would have been nice to participate. to bad i only really play on oce .{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Hello! Is it possible to update your entry?

Hey Kokoro, if you've got another email address you can submit with I'll allow it just this once - we'll take the most recent copy. :D 

But the intent for this contest is to put your best foot forward, so make sure to be super careful in future!

It takes me to the 'We've received your entry! Thanks for taking the time to share your work with us.' page if I use the link provided because of my first submission. Is there some other way to submit it?
hi hi, just want to make sure my entry got through all ok <:
Yup, I've got you! :)

Gonna lose so many hours of sleep after work during this period. 
[](https://media1.tenor.com/images/e2e82ff93631f17b1d08f0d598023b4b/tenor.gif?itemid=9945581)
You're telling me. This + day job = me already main lining caffiene.

Sleep is overrated anyway, right?


..riiiight? D:
Hi Riot! I'm currently studying in NZ and have been here over 5 years now. I'm not a permanent resident yet but I'm holding a student visa. My question is, can I still enter the event?
Hey! As long as you are currently a resident of NZ (or another Oceanic country) you're sweet. We're not going to check your actual PR status. ;)
Hey! Does our chosen champion have to be in an already created skin or could I say dress them in a way that I like but is still recognisable as that champ? Thanks :)
You're welcome to adapt a champion's outfit how you like (like designing your own skin) - as long as it fits the Ionia prompt, you're sweet!
How flexible are the rules on the theme? Would a skin of an Ionia champion be OK? (like arcade ahri or blood moon shen?) What about a concept skin for an Ionia champion?

Hey Six, my take on this - featuring an Ionian character in a non-Ionian setting wouldn't be rule-breaking, so it would be allowed - but it also wouldn't be a very strong use of the theme, which is one of the criteria on which entries are judged.

Arcade for example is a totally different 'universe' than the main League setting - so it's a fairly tenuous link!

Hope this helps to guide your ideas!
Black and white is totally fine :D

Hi, I was wondering if its possible to enter stuff like animations and specific details on if so. 5Mb is a tiny size for video formats so would it be alright to submit the entry as a link to a youtube video or the like?

Hey Rillian, the focus for this contest is mostly on art rather than animation - so your entry should ultimately be an image file. If you want to submit an animated GIF, that would be within the scope for this contest - but a full video would be out in this instance.
Ah. Well that's disappointing. Thanks for the response.
Sorry for all the questions, but can our piece have more than one scene? Like transition mid way or several times as you look through the piece?
Hey Vampire123199, ultimately you're only submitting one image file - but if you want to depict different aspects of a scene or even different scenes as part of one artwork, that's fine. :)
This is super intriguing! Are we allowed to enter short comics as our entry? Thanks!
Hey! A short comic like a one-pager would be fine, as long as it's a single image within the 5MB limit in the end and you can successfully convey your idea!
Wow, cool prizes. But boy does this seem like a lot of work.
Hopefully it feels like the Big Bang prize feels worth that work - please let me know if you disagree though because we're definitely trying something a bit new!

Personally, I think the prizes are pretty amazing and well worth the work! The prospect of a free table at Smash is pretty exciting for me, but the cintiq would be an absolute dream as someone hoping to pursue an artistic career.
tbh, I'd prefer the intuos over the cintiq.  13" is too small.

Hey there, I am little confused on the fact of weather you need a league champion in the piece work you send or weather you are free to do what you want within Ionian world, like a environment piece or some Ionian people.

I am also Interested in if you can send whatever you want as long as its within the 5MB.

A League character has to be present in some way in the piece (can be a recognisable side character but that's tricky to judge) but they don't have to be the focus of the piece.

This contest is also only open to OCE accounts (and in the case of physical prizes, addresses).
Does our entry have to be art in the form of a drawing/painting/etc (digital or otherwise), or can we do things like clay sculptures, plush, etc?
What size would the preferred canvas be?

Hey Vampire! So ultimately it could be anything from a 100x100px piece of pixel art, up to a beautiful big wallpaper! There's a 5MB size limit on submissions but other than that, the size of your canvas is up to you!
